mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.real_name userName, a.create_time createTime, b.real_name checkPersonName, a.check_person checkPerson, e.community_name currentCommunity, d.COMMUITY_NAME housingName FROM ( SELECT id,cert_code,real_name,community_id,check_person,create_time,update_time,is_health FROM t_c_health_code_sweep_record WHERE cert_code = #{certCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT id,cert_code,real_name,community_id,check_person,create_time,update_time,is_health FROM t_c_health_code_sweep_rec_his WHERE cert_code = #{certCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) a LEFT JOIN t_c_health_user_community_relate b ON a.check_person = b.mobile left join t_c_health_community_info e on b.community_id= e.id LEFT JOIN t_c_commuity_verifier_rela c ON c.VERIFIER_ID = b.id LEFT JOIN t_c_commuity d ON d.COMMUITY_ID = c.COMMUITY_ID
AND a.create_time >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND a.create_time <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
order by a.create_time desc
mapper.update:
update t_c_health_code_apply
update_flag = #{updateFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
person_auth_flag = #{personAuthFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cert_code=#{certCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cert_code certCode from t_c_health_code_apply where cert_code_secret=#{certCodeSecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
